name: Footer Generator
author: Ahmed Ehab

sections.description:
This plugin is, as the name suggests, a footer generator. As a user, you can install and activate the plugin to be able to easily and quickly add a sticky footer to your wordpress website. You have the option of adding from one up to five items in your footer. You may set the title, icon, hyperlink of each item. Another option is the self or blank option, this specifies whether the link will open in the current tab (self) or a new tab (blank).

The other settings available are the global footer settings. These include changing the color of the text and icons, the background color of the footer, the padding adding to the top and bottom of each item, the number of pixels (from the top) that the footer will show after scrolling, and the maximum view port size that will show this footer. There is also an option to enable/disable the footer, without having to deactive the whole plugin. The old settings will remain as they were when the footer is disabled.
sections.faq:
What Font Does The Footer Use?

The footer uses the native font of the theme currently in use.

What If I Only Want 3 Items in my Footer?

Only fill in the ‘title’ settings of the items you want to be included in your footer. Not filling in the ‘title’ setting will mean that this item will not be included.
